trans-unit.source: Defines size-related attributes of a cached bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: Meghatározza a gyorsítótárazott bitképet mérete kapcsolatos attribútumait.

trans-unit.source: A bitmap is scaled based on values that are defined by this class.
trans-unit.target: Ez az osztály által meghatározott értékek alapján van méretezhető bitkép.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> with empty sizing properties.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> üres méretezési tulajdonságokkal.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to zero, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to zero.
trans-unit.target: A visszaadott <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>fog rendelkezni a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>tulajdonsága <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>beállítása `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>állítsa nullára, és a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>nulla.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: When passed to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>, the input is the same as the output.
trans-unit.target: Ha a számára egy <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>, a bemeneti megegyezik a kimeneti.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Példányának <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight*>.
trans-unit.target: Egy példányát inicializálja <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> , amely megőrzi az eredeti oldalarányok a forrás bitkép, és adja meg egy kezdeti <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight*>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to the value of `pixelHeight`, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to zero.
trans-unit.target: A visszaadott <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>fog rendelkezni a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>tulajdonsága <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>beállítása `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>értékének beállítása `pixelHeight`, és a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>nulla.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A magassága képpontban megadva, az eredményül kapott bitkép.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Példányának <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when pixelHeight is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Akkor következik be, amikor pixelHeight nullánál kisebb.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation"></xref> to apply.
trans-unit.target: Egy példányát inicializálja <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> , amely megőrzi az eredeti oldalarányok a forrás bitkép, és adja meg a kiindulási <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation"> </xref> alkalmazni.

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap maintains its original aspect ratio and sizing.
trans-unit.target: Az eredményül kapott bitkép megőrzi az eredeti oldalarány és a méretezési.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to the value of `rotation`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to 0, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to 0.
trans-unit.target: A visszaadott <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>fog rendelkezni a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>tulajdonság értékének beállítása `rotation`, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>beállítása `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>értéke 0, és a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>értéke 0.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The initial rotation value to apply.
trans-unit.target: A kezdeti elforgatási alkalmazni.

trans-unit.source: Only 90 degree increments are supported.
trans-unit.target: Csak 90 fokos növekmények esetén támogatottak.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth*>.
trans-unit.target: Egy példányát inicializálja <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> , amely megőrzi az eredeti oldalarányok a forrás bitkép, és adja meg egy kezdeti <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth*>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to zero, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to the value of `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: A visszaadott <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>fog rendelkezni a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>tulajdonsága <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>beállítása `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>állítsa nullára, és a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>értékének beállítása `pixelWidth`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A szélessége képpontban megadva, az eredményül kapott bitkép.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Példányának <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when pixelWidth is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Akkor következik be, amikor pixelWidth nullánál kisebb.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that does not preserve the original bitmap aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: Egy példányát inicializálja <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> , amely nem őrzi meg a bitkép eredeti oldalarány.

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap has an effective size of `pixelHeight` × `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: Az eredményül kapott bitkép korlátja egy hatékony `pixelHeight` × `pixelWidth`.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `false`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to the value of `pixelHeight`, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to the value of `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: A visszaadott <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>fog rendelkezni a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>tulajdonsága <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>beállítása `false`, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>értékének beállítása `pixelHeight`, és a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>értékének beállítása `pixelWidth`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A szélessége képpontban megadva, az eredményül kapott bitkép.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A magassága képpontban megadva, az eredményül kapott bitkép.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when pixelHeight is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Akkor következik be, amikor pixelHeight nullánál kisebb.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: A magassága képpontban megadva, a bitkép kép.

trans-unit.source: PixelHeight must be greater than zero to be valid.
trans-unit.target: PixelHeight érvényes nullánál nagyobbnak kell lennie.

trans-unit.source: The height of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A bitkép magasságát.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: A szélessége képpontban megadva, a bitkép kép.

trans-unit.source: PixelWidth must be greater than zero to be valid.
trans-unit.target: PixelWidth érvényes nullánál nagyobbnak kell lennie.

trans-unit.source: The width of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A bitkép szélessége.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether the aspect ratio of the original bitmap image is preserved.
trans-unit.target: Egy érték, amely meghatározza, hogy megőrzi a bitkép kép eredeti oldalarányának lekérdezi.

trans-unit.source: If the original aspect ratio is preserved, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> represent the maximum size values for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Ha az eredeti oldalarány megmarad, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>és <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>határoz meg a maximális mérete értékének a következő bitkép.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap is only guaranteed to have either its width or its height match the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Az eredményül kapott bitkép csak garantáltan szélességének vagy magasságának a megadott értékekre.

trans-unit.source: If the aspect ratio is not preserved, the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> are both used, and the bitmap is stretched to use those values.
trans-unit.target: Ha az eredeti oldalarányok nem őrződik meg, a megadott <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>és <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>is használja, és használja ezeket az értékeket a bitkép értéke felhőbe.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the original aspect ratio is maintained; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a rendszer az eredeti oldalarány; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the rotation angle that is applied to a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Az elforgatás szögét bitkép alkalmazott jelző érték beolvasása.

trans-unit.source: Only increments of 90 degrees are supported.
trans-unit.target: Csak a 90 fokos növekmények esetén támogatottak.

trans-unit.source: The rotation angle that is applied to the image.
trans-unit.target: A kép alkalmazott elforgatás szögét.
